instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-3536: What is 820-3536? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.
definitions.PP3V43_G3H: What is PP3V43_G3H? This is a typo of PP3V42_G3H When you see PP3V43_G3H, assume they meant to type PP3V42_G3H.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3536</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-a no power
threads.message: He had contact with liquid, deoxidized, but he doesn't care. I identified short in <SIGNAL>PP3V43_G3H</SIGNAL> , I removed the SMC, the short came out, but I have no donor plate of the same model to remove, it serves of another model PRO RETINA ?
